Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh and Axar Patel took two wickets each
Mohammed Siraj and Ravi Bishnoi clinched one wicket each
Sri Lanka's entire innings collapsed at 170 runs in 19.2 overs
Pathum Nissanka's 79 off 48 balls and Kusal Mendis's 45 off 27 balls were the standout performances for Sri Lanka
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and decided to bat first
Sri Lanka's Matheesha Pathirana took four wickets
Sri Lanka won the toss and decided to bowl first
Sri Lanka's T20I squad includes Pathum Nissanka, Kusal Mendis, and Wanindu Hasaranga
India's T20I squad includes Shubman Gill, Yashasvi Jaiswal, and Suryakumar Yadav
Sri Lanka's captain Charith Asalanka said they are going to bowl first and want to see how the pitch behaves
India's Suryakumar Yadav said it looks good to bat first and the relationship with Gautam Gambhir is special
The pitch is described as balanced with equal opportunities for bowlers and batters
The weather report suggests thunderstorms but low chances of rain during the match
Post-Match Reflections: India's Axar Patel celebrated the wicket of Sri Lanka's Kusal Perera
India took a 1-0 lead in the three-T20 match series with this win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays led to the game being postponed until the next day
This was the first T20I match between the two teams in 2024
